nodes.text: According to Gungan religion, Gobba was the god of spring water. Along with the goddess Dobbis, he was one of the most important divinities of nature. In the mythology, Gobba's actions were tought to be supervised by Oma-Oma, the principal divinity, and he lived with the rest of the pantheon in the splendid underwater city of Ossorus.

This deity only appeared in the French edition of the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds, in the database entry pertaining to the Gungan society. This detail was absent from the English version of the entry. Several other deities, namely Balam, Dobbis, Nododo, Kobble, Balmtop, Mekamok and Wamka Pol are also exclusive to the French version of the database. Though most of these names were not used in any other source, Nododo was set to appear in The Essential Guide to Episode I before it was cancelled.
